title: SOLD - 1911 T3 Turkey Red Cabinet Johnny Kling Chicago Natl ad back
author: Golfcollector

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1911 T3 Turkey Red Cabinet Johnny Kling Chicago Natl ad back
posts.post_content:
As part of the large collection of cards I purchased, here is another item for sale.

Listed here for sale is a 1911 Turkey Red #102 Johnny Kling of Chicago.  This is a Turkey Red Cabinet ad back version.  Nice shape, no pin holes, rounded corners, overall pretty clean.

Front and back scans shown.  


Thanks for looking!

I may periodically lower the price until this one is gone.  Don't miss out!

[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/b2e54477-5ea3-4b0c-af58-0b176f687fb9_zpslsih1010.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/3b766749-5726-4aed-8567-f1ca45656c5f_zps1ibtxpoo.jpg[/IMG]
Lowered the price, bumped it up
